thread.title: Trump administration revokes protections for transgender students in public schools
thread.title_full: Trump administration revokes protections for transgender students in public schools

author: John Wagner
title: Trump administration revokes protections for transgender students in public schools
text: Trump administration revokes protections for transgender students in public schools   The Trump administration on Feb. 22 revoked federal protections for transgender students in public schools who sought to use the restrooms that match their gender identity. ( ) RELATED LINKS - The Trump administration on Feb. 22 revoked federal protections for transgender students in public schools who sought to use the restrooms that match their gender identity.
